The researcher is that we are among the Muslims, and from the righteous of the righteous on the way of the truth, which is faith and obedience, it is said: the man is the one if the man is running and sought: ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ Upper, and they have been overwhelmed by the enemy, so whoever is Muslim, then you have a sign of those who became Muslim, and the collection is to adopt the meaning, and they will be eager, and they are meant by the righteousness And the arrogance read "Rashd" by the guarantee of the railway and the coffin of the sheen.
